title: Top Places to Visit in Deoria, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Deoria is a city in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is one of five tehsils of the Deoria district. Deoria is located 50 km to the southeast of Gorakhpur and about 310 km from the state capital Lucknow.

Deoria district is one of the districts of Uttar Pradesh state of India, and Deoria town is the district headquarters. Deoria district is a part of Gorakhpur division. Deoria District came into existence at March 16, 1946 from Gorakhpur district.

 

Geography

Deoria district is located between 26 ° 6' and 26° 48' north latitude to 83° 23' and 84° 16' east longitude. It is surrounded by Kushinagar district in the north, Gopalganj and Siwan districts of Bihar in the east, Mau and Ballia districts in the south and Gorakhpur district in the west.

 

Ghaghara, Rapti and Chhoti Gandak are the main rivers in the district.

 

Deoria district consists of 16 blocks:

 

Baitalpur, Bankata

Barhaj, Harnoutha & more.., Bhagalpur

Bhalubani, Bhatni

Bhatpar Rani, Deoria, Desai Deoria

Gauri Bazaar, Lar

Pathardeva, Rampur Karkhana

Rudrapur, Salempur

Tarkulwa, Places adjacent to Deoria district

Demographics, Religions in Deoria District

 

According to the 2011 census Deoria district has a population of 3,098,637, roughly equal to the nation of Mongolia or the US state of Iowa. This gives it a ranking of 114th in India (out of a total of 640). The district has a population density of 1,220 inhabitants per square kilometre (3,200/sq mi) . Its population growth rate over the decade 2001-2011 was 14.23%. Deoria has a sex ratio of 1013 females for every 1000 males, and a literacy rate of 73.53%.

 

Languages

Vernaculars spoken in Deoria include Bhojpuri language and also spoken Hindi with English language almost 40 000 speakers, written in both the Devanagari and Kaithi .

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deoria_district

subContents.SubTitle: 1. Dewaraha Baba Aashram
subContents.SubContent:
Devraha Baba (died 19 May 1990), also spelled Deoraha baba was an Indian Siddha Yogi saint who lived beside the Yamuna river in Mathura. He was known as "ageless Yogi with a secular image". He was known as a sadhu who preached harmony between religious communities.

Deoraha Baba Ashram Deoraha Baba Ashram established at Village Mayil on the Bank of river Saryu in barhaj Tehsil Deoria. Deoraha baba one of the renowned Yogi (Saint) in the history of India, the holy ascetic, and hermit. he was the 11th after Ramanuja Achrya Who was giving grace and spiritual knowledge to many saints, yogis, priests, rich and poor people.

subContents.SubTitle: 2. Dugdheswarnath Mandir
subContents.SubContent: Dugdheswar Mandir is on the central pilgrims of north-east India. It is one of the superb historical ‘Shiv’ temples located at approx. 2 km. north of Rudrapur town. There are many types of opinion about this Mandir. It is also a hypothesis that this Mandir is Founded By Rudrapur Maharaja, Where He was Used to workship. This Mandir is Located Near around 20 Acer Area. Explore interesting themes, fabulous natural designs here. Dugdheshwar Nath (Lord Shiva), Located at Rudrapur, District Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India.

subContents.SubTitle: 3. Hanuman Mandir
subContents.SubContent: Hanuman Mandir which is situated in Deoria is an ideal destination for a great time. It’s a great place for sightseeing, but it also allows you to steal a self-indulgent moment for yourself as well. Hanuman Mandir is placed at Raghav Nagar, Deoria & is one of the ‘siddh’ places of Deoria. A large no. of participants can be seen on each Tuesday. It is enclosed by a Big Pond In which You Can see various type of Fishes. hanuman mandir, Deoria is the sure way to renew and relax after a busy weekday. Explore fascinating themes, amazing designs, interesting landscapes, amusing characters, ambient music, props and merchandise available in nearby stores- all at one place.

subContents.SubTitle: 4. How to Reach
subContents.SubContent:
BY BUS

There are no bus routes from other major cities to Deoria. Nearest bus stand is Salempur.

Deoria

23 km away

Salempur Salempur, Uttar Pradesh

Deoria

30 km away

Kushinagar Kushinagar, Uttar Pradesh

 

BY TRAIN

You can easily get regular trains to Deoria from other major cities of the country.

Railway Station(s): Deoria Sadar (DEOS), Ahalyapur (AHLR)

 

BY FLIGHT

Deoria does not have an airport. Nearest airport is Gorakhpur Airport.

Deoria

52 km away

Gorakhpur Airport (GOP), Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh

Deoria

152 km away

Varanasi Airport (VNS), Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Rampur, Uttar Pradesh
recommendations.content: Rampur is a city and a municipality headquarter of Rampur District in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. recommendations.title: Top Places to Visit in Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh
recommendations.content: Chandauli is a town and a nagar panchayat in Chandauli district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is the administrative headquarters of Chandauli District. recommendations.title: Top Places to Visit in Budaun, Uttar Pradesh
recommendations.content: Budaun (also spelled as Badaun, formerly Vodamayuta) is a city and a seat of Budaun district, Uttar Pradesh, India. recommendations.title: Top Places to Visit in Varanasi with family.
recommendations.content: Varanasi, also known as Benares, Banaras, or Kashi, is a city on the banks of the Ganges in the Uttar Pradesh state of North India, 320 kilometres (200 mi) south-east of the state capital, Lucknow, and 121 kilometres (75 mi) east of Allahabad.
